metadata.title: CVE-2021-43668 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Go-Ethereum 1.10.9 nodes crash (denial of service) after receiving a serialof messages and cannot be recovered. They will crash with "runtime error:invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" and arise a SEGV signal.

criterions.comment: golang-goleveldb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
